title: [Phase 1] Webcam & Canvas Overlay Basics
body:
Goal:
- Establish webcam capture, video rendering, and a canvas overlay in the browser.

Scope:
- In scope: getUserMedia, video rendering, canvas alignment, basic UI controls.
- Out of scope: backend communication, tracking, karaoke.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Webcam starts/stops without errors.
- Video renders continuously.
- Canvas overlay stays aligned with video.

title: [Phase 2] Backend Face Detection Pipeline
body:
Goal:
- Enable real-time face detection on the backend and return bounding boxes to the frontend.

Scope:
- In scope: WebSocket communication, frame ingestion, YOLOv8 inference, bounding box response.
- Out of scope: tracking, identity assignment, karaoke.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Frontend can send frames to backend.
- Backend returns face bounding boxes in real time.
- Boxes are rendered in the frontend overlay.

title: [Phase 3] Tracking & Identity Assignment
body:
Goal:
- Stabilize detections over time and allow user interaction.

Scope:
- In scope: multi-object tracking, stable track_id, click-to-select face, assign/display names.
- Out of scope: karaoke playback.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Track IDs stay stable across multiple seconds.
- Clicking a face selects the correct track.
- Assigned names persist while tracking is active.

title: [Phase 4] Karaoke Engine (Standalone)
body:
Goal:
- Implement karaoke playback and lyric timing without CV dependencies.

Scope:
- In scope: LRC parsing, audio playback, lyric timing/highlighting, play/pause/restart.
- Out of scope: face integration.

Acceptance Criteria:
- LRC file is parsed correctly.
- Lyrics change at correct timestamps.
- Playback controls work as expected.

title: [Phase 5] Karaoke Integrated with Live Faces
body:
Goal:
- Bind karaoke lyrics to tracked faces and render them in the overlay.

Scope:
- In scope: assign song to person, render lyrics above face, sync audio and overlay.
- Out of scope: advanced UI polish.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Lyrics follow the correct tracked face.
- Audio playback and lyric display remain synchronized.
- End-to-end flow works locally.

title: [Phase 6] Metrics, Evaluation & Polishing
body:
Goal:
- Collect and report MVP metrics and document trade-offs.

Scope:
- In scope: latency/FPS metrics, basic resource stats, trade-off documentation.
- Out of scope: large-scale benchmarking.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Metrics in docs/metrics-checklist.md are collected at least once.
- Trade-offs documented in docs/tradeoffs.md.

title: [Post-MVP] Songs & Media Management
body:
Goal:
- Add support for multiple songs and media asset management.

Scope:
- In scope: song list, metadata, selectable tracks, basic import conventions.
- Out of scope: licensing and online catalogs.

Acceptance Criteria:
- At least 3 songs can be managed and selected in UI.
- Each song links to audio + LRC data reliably.
- Missing assets are handled with clear error states.

title: [Post-MVP] UI/UX Polish Pass
body:
Goal:
- Improve readability, layout quality, and interaction clarity in the frontend.

Scope:
- In scope: spacing, typography, responsive tuning, panel hierarchy, status feedback.
- Out of scope: complete redesign.

Acceptance Criteria:
- UI remains usable on desktop and mobile breakpoints.
- Karaoke controls and metrics are clearly readable.
- Error and reconnect states are visually explicit.

title: [Post-MVP] Cloud Deployment Baseline
body:
Goal:
- Define and implement a basic deploy path for frontend and backend.

Scope:
- In scope: frontend static hosting, backend runtime target, env config, deployment docs.
- Out of scope: autoscaling and production SRE setup.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Frontend deploy target is reproducible from CI.
- Backend deploy target and start command are documented.
- End-to-end smoke test works on deployed URLs.

title: [Post-MVP] Persistent Face Recognition Across Sessions
body:
Goal:
- Re-identify known users across sessions with explicit consent and privacy notes.

Scope:
- In scope: embedding pipeline, local identity store, opt-in management flow.
- Out of scope: cloud identity sync.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Known users can be re-identified after restart.
- Unknown users remain unassigned until user confirmation.
- Privacy/retention behavior is documented.

title: [Post-MVP] Performance Optimization Pass
body:
Goal:
- Improve runtime stability and reduce latency under realistic webcam usage.

Scope:
- In scope: profiling, frame pacing strategy, backend inference frequency tuning, rendering optimization.
- Out of scope: multi-node scaling.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Measured latency/FPS improve against current baseline.
- No regression in detection/tracking behavior.
- Updated measurements are documented.

title: [Post-MVP] Accessory Drawing & Face Anchoring
body:
Goal:
- Allow drawing simple accessories and anchor them to heads/faces in live view.

Scope:
- In scope: draw tool basics, anchor strategy, transform updates per frame.
- Out of scope: full AR pipeline.

Acceptance Criteria:
- User can draw at least one accessory shape.
- Accessory follows a selected face/head with acceptable stability.
- Feature can be toggled on/off without breaking core flow.
